snippet: The white French Renaissance palace, which ended up as little more than a symbol of the stalled recovery from the 2010 earthquake, will be ripped apart over the coming months and carted off.
abstract: National Palace in Haiti, which was extensively damaged in the January 2010 earthquake, is in the process of being demolished by the J/P Haitian Relief Organization, a charity run by the actor Sean Penn.

byline.contributor: André Paultre contributed reporting from Port-au-Prince, Haiti.

lead_paragraph: The white French Renaissance palace, which ended up as little more than a symbol of the stalled recovery from the 2010 earthquake, will be ripped apart over the coming months and carted off.

headline.main: Palace in Haiti, Damaged by Quake, Is Being Razed
headline.print_headline: Palace in Haiti, Damaged by Quake, Is Being Razed
